attributes.action: help to create a global resource based economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The monetry system is now outdated and un-nessecary.It is a pyramid system of scarcity.Unequal access for people of the nessecitys and wants of life.We now have the technology and knowledge to create abundance.If we have abundance then the scarecity based monetry system becomes obsolete. A resource based economy will solve nearly all of the worlds current problems.No excageration.
